description:
In this round, Kazuma is up against Mizuno, and he has to make melon bread. The problem? He has no idea how to make melon bread! Can he possibly beat Mizuno, who is not only incredibly skilled, but who also uses premier ingredients?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C`est prêt !! Le melon pan qui rend gaga !
Hey Omachi!! Melon Pan de Melon Melon!
Order`s Up!! Going Bananas for Melon Bread!
เฮ้ มาแล้วครับ ขนมปังเมล๊อน เมล่อน!
ヘイお待ち!! メロンパンでメロンメロン!
